name: Match Triple 3D - Tile Master
description:
Find, match, collect 3D objects to be tile master! Kill time.
Let’s try and become a master!

Triple Match 3D - Block Master is a new brand, challenging and original matching pairs game.
Connect your brain to logical thinking. Test your brain out.
Blow your mind to find and match identical 3D objects to make them pop among a tangled mess. Tap on the same 3 tiles over the board.

So addicting game to love.
Challenge against time, improve your matching skills and train your memoria.

Main Features:
- A huge amount of 3D objects.
- Catchy sounds and vivid 3D visual effects
- Well-designed brain trainer to improve your brain
- Unlock chests to collect your objects and get them all

We hope you will love Triple Match 3D - Block Master, Funny, Train your mind, Kill time!
